column4: what is the minimum system requirements in order to install compiz, beryl or others?
not that much. if your system is 4 years old or younger its fine
you'll need to either look at it physically or find out in the operating system
make sure you have graphics drivers installed. Should be ok but not whizzy. you could upgrade the vga to a cheapo nvidia and be fine :)
i only have onboard graphics card.
but you may find its ok
most souce tar.bz2 (or whatevers) have a README file which can advise on how to compile it
do you have the compiling tools and the dependancys of the program
